mapper.update:
UPDATE league_match SET
league_match.KickAt = #{ kickAt },
league_match.HomeScore = #{ homeScore },
league_match.GuestScore = #{ guestScore },
league_match.HomeClubId = #{ homeClubId },
league_match.GuestClubId = #{ guestClubId },
league_match.Round = #{ round },
league_match.RoundName = #{ roundName },
league_match.Knockout = #{ knockout },
league_match.Weekday = #{ weekday },
league_match.Stadium = #{ stadium },
league_match.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
league_match.LeagueSubId = #{ leagueSubId },
league_match.Audiences = #{ audiences },
league_match.RelativeTag = #{ relativeTag },
league_match.Year = #{ year },
league_match.VideoUrl = #{ videoUrl },
league_match.MatchStatus = #{ matchStatus },
league_match.TypeName = #{ typeName },
league_match.TypeFullName = #{ typeFullName },
league_match.TypeEnglishName = #{ typeEnglishName },
league_match.TypeEnglishFullName = #{ typeEnglishFullName },
league_match.TypeRegionName = #{ typeRegionName },
league_match.Type = #{ type },
league_match.SubTypeName = #{ subTypeName },
league_match.SubTypeFullName = #{ subTypeFullName },
league_match.SubTypeEnglishName = #{ subTypeEnglishName },
league_match.SubTypeEnglishFullName = #{ subTypeEnglishFullName },
league_match.SubTypeRegion = #{ subTypeRegion },
league_match.SubType = #{ subType },
league_match.HomeClubName = #{ homeClubName },
league_match.HomeClubLogo = #{ homeClubLogo },
league_match.HomeClubEnglishName = #{ homeClubEnglishName },
league_match.HomeClubFullName = #{ homeClubFullName },
league_match.HomeClubEnglishFullName = #{ homeClubEnglishFullName },
league_match.HomeClubColor = #{ homeClubColor },
league_match.GuestClubName = #{ guestClubName },
league_match.GuestClubLogo = #{ guestClubLogo },
league_match.GuestClubEnglishName = #{ guestClubEnglishName },
league_match.GuestClubFullName = #{ guestClubFullName },
league_match.GuestClubEnglishFullName = #{ guestClubEnglishFullName },
league_match.GuestClubColor = #{ guestClubColor }
WHERE id= #{id}
